title: 3,700 MT of Gas to reach Sri Lanka
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The shortage of gas in Sri Lanka has taken its toll on the nation’s urban population, as well as the rural masses.
Litro Gas said that a vessel carrying 3,700 MT of gas will be arriving in the country today (17), while another vessel carrying 3,700 MT of gas is scheduled to arrive on the 19th of May 2022.
The Chairman of Litro said that necessary payments will be made for the two vessels that are reaching Sri Lanka from Oman.
